title: What's Mittens Thinking? Make 'Sense' Of Your Pet's Behavior
teaser: Animal behaviorist John Bradshaw's books Cat Sense and Dog Sense detail what cat and dog owners should expect from their animals. Cat Sense originally aired Sept. 5, 2013. Dog Sense originally aired May 26, 2011.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
